issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement SHA1 and SHA256 functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11984](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11984). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement Gandiva C++ functions to process SHA128 and SHA256 algorithms on numeric and string fields.

comments.body:
